dcterms:creator: Jonathan Hiller
Hod Lipson
dcterms:description: A voxel-based physics engine that simulates elastic voxels using particles and beams, allowing for dynamic simulation of soft multimaterial 3D-printed objects.
dcterms:title: Voxelyze

dcterms:creator: Michael Schmidt
Hod Lipson
dcterms:description: An evolutionary algorithm that uses the concept of Pareto dominance and an objective of 'age' to promote diversity among candidate designs and prevent premature convergence.
dcterms:title: Age-Fitness-Pareto Optimization

dcterms:creator: Jie Tan
Tingnan Zhang
Erwin Coumans
Atil Iscen
Yunfei Bai
Danijar Hafner
Steven Bohez
Vincent Vanhoucke
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on learning agile locomotion for quadruped robots, demonstrating the transfer of learned behaviors from simulation to real-world applications.
dcterms:title: Sim-to-real: Learning agile locomotion for quadruped robots

dcterms:creator: Homanga Bharadhwaj
Zihan Wang
Yoshua Bengio
Liam Paull
dcterms:description: A framework designed to efficiently train navigation policies and facilitate the transfer of learned behaviors from simulation to real-world environments.
dcterms:title: A data-efficient framework for training and sim-to-real transfer of navigation policies

dcterms:creator: Konstantinos Chatzilygeroudis
Vassilis Vassiliades
Jean-Baptiste Mouret
dcterms:description: A study on learning methods for robot damage recovery without the need for resetting the robot to a previous state, focusing on trial-and-error learning.
dcterms:title: Reset-free trial-and-error learning for robot damage recovery
